title: add-node output
description: Output schema of the add-node action

node_id.title: Node identifier
node_id.description: Allocated identifier of the new node

ip_address.title: Node IP address
ip_address.description: VPN IP address of the added node

network.title: Cluster network address
network.description: The VPN network in CIDR notation used by the cluster

leader_public_key.title: Leader VPN key
leader_public_key.description: WireGuard public key of the leader node

leader_ip_address.title: Leader IP address
leader_ip_address.description: VPN IP address of the leader node

leader_endpoint.title: Leader public VPN UDP endpoint
leader_endpoint.description: WireGuard public UDP endpoint address to contact the leader node. Syntax is `hostname:port` or `IP:port`
